name: ELUSIVE COMET
description: ELUSIVE COMET is a sophisticated threat actor that specifically targets cryptocurrency users and organizations through social engineering attacks that leverage legitimate business workflows. They are known for creating believable pretexts (such as fake media interview opportunities) to establish trust with targets. Their operations demonstrate a high level of operational security, careful target selection, and detailed knowledge of both cryptocurrency operations and the business contexts they impersonate. The group has been linked to millions in cryptocurrency theft through methodical and patient social engineering campaigns.
